select to_char(reserv_start_date, 'mm') as salesByMonth, sum(pay_money) as totalprice from ( select* from reservation r join payinfo p on r.reserv_num=p.reserv_num )
group by to_char(reserv_start_date, 'mm')

select decode(to_char(PAY_REGDATE,'MM'), 01, '01', 02, '02', 03, '03', 04, '04', 05, '05', 06, '06', 07, '07', 08, '08', 09, '09', 10, '10', 11, '11', 12, '12') "PAYDATE", decode(to_char(PAY_REGDATE,'MM'), 01, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0)), 02, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0)), 03, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0)), 04, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0)), 05, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0)), 06, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0)), 07, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0)), 08, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0)), 09, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0)), 10, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0)), 11, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0)), 12, sum(nvl(PAY_MONEY,0))) "TOTALPAY" from PAYINFO where extract(year from PAY_REGDATE) = extract(year from sysdate) and PAY_CANCELDATE is null group by to_char(PAY_REGDATE,'MM')
